jobDescription: Company Overview Screenvision is a national leader in cinema advertising, offering on-screen advertising, in-lobby promotions and integrated marketing programs to national, regional and local advertisers and providing comprehensive cinema advertising representation services for its theatrical exhibitor partners. The Screenvision cinema advertising network is comprised of 14,400 screens in 2,400 theater locations across all 50 states and 94% of DMAs nationwide.  Come help us meet the demand and be part of one of the advertising industry’s fastest growing segments! Business Operations CoordinatorPosition Summary The Business Operations Coordinator will assist the Vice President of Business Operations in the development and execution of processes and strategies that help our sales teams run effectively and efficiently. This includes managing sales tools and resources, maintaining our CRM database system, forecasting and analyzing our current business, maintaining various trend reports, and representing the needs of sales across Screenvision Media.
